# CivicAid - Modular Civic-Tech Platform

A modular civic-technology platform enabling streamlined citizen services through intelligent automation.

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

```bash
# Install Python dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt

# Run all demos
bash scripts/run_all_demos.sh
```

## ğŸ“¦ Modules

| Module | Port | Owner | Description | Tech Stack |
|--------|------|-------|-------------|------------|
| WhatsApp | 5001 | Adithyan | Modular WhatsApp Bot Generator | Python/Flask |
| Dispatch | 5002 | Lestlin | AI-powered emergency dispatch | Next.js + Python |
| LeadGen | 5003 | Lestlin | RAG-based case analysis | Python/Flask |
| Education | 5004 | Basil | PPT/PDF generator | Python/Flask |
| Web UI | - | Amal & Anita | Landing page & demos | HTML/CSS |

## ğŸ”§ Running Individual Modules

### WhatsApp (Adithyan)
```bash
python -m modules.whatsapp.app
```

### Dispatch (Lestlin)
```bash
# Option 1: Run Next.js Frontend (Recommended)
cd modules/dispatch/dispatch-service
npm install
npm run dev
# CivicAid (Startup)

Unified platform for civic tech modules.

## Access
- **Main Portal**: `http://localhost:5002` (Serves both Landing Page and APIs)
- **LeadGen AI**: `http://localhost:5002/leadgen.html`
- **Dispatcher**: `http://localhost:5002/dispatch.html`


# Option 2: Run Flask Backend Only
python -m modules.dispatch.dispatcher_stub
```

### LeadGen (Lestlin)
```bash
python -m modules.leadgen.leadgen_stub
```

### Education (Basil)
```bash
python -m modules.education.ppt_generator_stub
```

## ğŸ“‹ API Contracts

All endpoints are defined in `contracts/openapi.yaml`. This is the single source of truth for API integration.

### Endpoints

- `POST /whatsapp/generate` - Generate WhatsApp bot flows
- `POST /dispatch/webhook` - Handle call dispatch with failover
- `POST /leadgen/analyze` - Analyze cases and generate recommendations
- `POST /education/generate` - Generate educational presentations

## ğŸŒ¿ Branch Naming Convention

```
feature/{member}-{short-desc}
```

Examples:
- `feature/adithyan-whatsapp-generator`
- `feature/lestlin-dispatch-twilio`
- `feature/basil-pptx-generation`
- `feature/amal-landing-page`

## ğŸ§ª Running Tests

```bash
# Run all tests
pytest modules/ -v

# Run specific module tests
pytest modules/whatsapp/tests/ -v
pytest modules/dispatch/tests/ -v
pytest modules/leadgen/tests/ -v
pytest modules/education/tests/ -v
```

## ğŸ¤ Contributing

1. Create a feature branch following naming convention
2. Update `contracts/openapi.yaml` if adding/modifying endpoints
3. Add/update tests in `modules/<module>/tests/`
4. Submit PR using the template in `.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md`
